Header: National Education Diploma holders to get jobs
Content: 4,286 National education diploma holders will receive teaching appointments next month. The Ministry of Education announces that the diploma holders were selected based on the results released on the 1st of August. The majority of the appointees will be assigned to National Schools countrywide. The Ministry of Education states that a significant number of teaching vacancies in Sinhala, Tamil and English languages have been earmarked and the new recruits will be dispatched to vacant positions. According to the Ministry, 3,748 appointments will be made to National Schools and the rest will be to the Provincial Schools.
